text:
<!channel> Anyone looking for a new job? 

Exciting opportunity to work in Financial Crime Technology at KPMG (with me) Tech stack is mostly python but opportunity to work with AWS, ECS, terraform, vault, JavaScript (reactjs), Jenkins, docker... machine learning.. We are focussed on finding someone who is keen to learn so no requirement to have experience in all of the tech listed or Financial Crime. Feel free to send me a message to learn more!

<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6478346553730875392>

attachments.title: Liam Pauling on LinkedIn: "Exciting opportunity to work in our Financial Crime Technology team focussed on asset development, feel free to get in contact to learn more!"
attachments.text: December 11, 2018: Liam Pauling posted an article on LinkedIn
attachments.fallback: Liam Pauling on LinkedIn: "Exciting opportunity to work in our Financial Crime Technology team focussed on asset development, feel free to get in contact to learn more!"

elements.text:
Anyone looking for a new job? 

Exciting opportunity to work in Financial Crime Technology at KPMG (with me) Tech stack is mostly python but opportunity to work with AWS, ECS, terraform, vault, JavaScript (reactjs), Jenkins, docker... machine learning.. We are focussed on finding someone who is keen to learn so no requirement to have experience in all of the tech listed or Financial Crime. Feel free to send me a message to learn more!
